Licensed & appointed insurance agent in all 50 states in the US & Washington DC.  NPN 17345910Sold Medicare related, as well as dental & vision insurance products directly over the telephone inbound and outbound sales.

After running International Publications as it's CEO, an opportunity to own the company presented itself, which made sense for the most expedient way to implement the significant company identity and brand shift required for migrating a 32 year old print-based directory business model, to a cutting edge online based search engine.  It became the largest Christian based directory website in the world during my leadership with radically significant changes to the focus of the businesses mission statement and how to best create a value add to the over 20,000 advertisers nationally, and the millions of users looking for a trustworthy business or organization.

Instrumental in creating a vision, and executing a plan for transforming an entire print based directory business model/infrastructure of over 32 years, into the largest, and most successful online search directory for the Christian based niche market.

http://www.whoiamfoundation.orgWho I Am Foundation is a national  501(c)3 Tax Exempt Non-Profit Organization. The organization is predominately focused on bettering our communities nationwide. Our goal is to help each individual we connect with define who he or she is by making available the proper resources. Each year our communities grow further and further apart. Resources are available however; the public does not recognize many of those available resources. Our mission is to be as proactive in the community as possible constantly retrieving feedback to continuously advance as new community issues arise. We believe our tri-annual campaigns are the most effective way to address the issues our communities are facing.

summary: An experienced visionary for small business development, focusing on defining brand & identity clarity from the top down, sales & operation optimization, and implementing technology to strengthen connections with existing customers, while identifying and connecting with new ones.  Coming from the perspective and truly understanding the unique nature of owning & operating a small business, having to wear many different 'hats', while creatively ensuring costs are minimized to maximize company profits.  From start-ups to 100 year old established companies, every business has room to improve it's internal structures and maximize it's sales efforts.  Efficiencies translate to profits, clarity of vision and mission statements ensures a unified team, and small tweaks from an experienced perspective can often change a good business into a truly great one.
